1.title: Chase Culp in "Promoting Fool's"
1.plot: When we traveled to the South By South West Interactive, Music, Film & Comedy festival in March of 2013, we posted a call for help on our Facebook page. We asked if there were any clowns in the area that might be able to help us promote the series. The only reply we got was by a wonderful young circus clown from Houston, Texas. He showed us some love, so we decided to profile him, and introduce him to the Fool's Idea community.

2.title: Summer Shapiro in "Just Be Yourself!" or "Everything She Does Must Fail!"
2.plot: A story of survival and triumph on the performer Summer Shapiro.

3.title: David "Leapin' Louie" Lichtenstein in "That Is the Life for Me!"
3.plot: Take a moment out of your busy life to learn a little more about this incredible trick-roping, whip-cracking, stilt-walking, Clowns Without Borders humanitarian; David "Leapin' Louie" Lichtenstein!!!! You might just discover your inner wannabe cowboy!

4.title: Thomas "Tommy Twimble" Schroyer in "When the Audience Laughs Together."
4.plot: Learn about this brilliant silent comedy vaudevillian, as he juggles his hat, performs moments of magic and reveals his inspiration, motivation and creative process.

5.title: Avner the Eccentric in "I Was Born Hungry & I'll Die Hungry... "
5.plot: Presenting the world-renowned vaudevillian, hypnotherapist, juggler, mime, expert NLP (neural linguistic programming) teacher, magician and master eccentric performer - Avner Eisenberg (AKA "Avner the Eccentric").

6.title: Faeble Kievman in "Humans Are Weird"
6.plot: HUMANS ARE WEIRD with Faeble Kievman. (An Artists Journey to Creative Freedom)

7.title: Aitor Basauri in "WE ARE IDIOTS" the Absurd Adventures of a Spy Monkey
7.plot: Welcome to a totally NEW episode of A FOOL'S IDEA, featuring the incredibly funny - Aitor Basauri (joint artistic director & performer in the world famous UK based physical comedy theater company Spy Monkey). Take a journey with us through the ups and downs of life in one of the most hilarious theater companies in the world! "I believe...all human beings...the common denominator is that we are idiots. Some of them are much better at hiding it. I am not so good..." - Aitor Basauri Aitor shares his journey of self-discovery, learning the art of being funny and realizing...

imdb.title: A Fool's Idea - Presents
plot: A documentary profile series featuring intimate stories with physical comedians, circus artists, theater artists, performance artists and clowns from around the world.::Brian A. Bernhard
